#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,d,i,j,k,z,sum;
    string a="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
    string s1,s2;
    cin>>t;
    while(t)
    {
        cin>>s1>>s2>>d;
        sum=0;
        for(i=0;i<26;i++)
        {
            k=z=0;
            for(j=0;j<s1.length();j++)
            {
                if(a[i]==s1[j] && j<s1.length())
                    k++;
                
            }
            for(j=0;j<s2.length();j++)
            {
                if(a[i]==s2[j] && j<s2.length())
                    z++;
            }
            k-=z;
            if(k<0)
                k=-k;
            sum+=k;
        }
        if(sum<=d)
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
t--;
}
return 0;
}
